data.name: Hank Pym
data.description: Founding member of the Avengers and the original Ant-Man, Hank Pym uses his genius to change size, command armies of ants, and support his allies.

starItems.name: Hank Pym
starItems.description: Founding member of the Avengers and the original Ant-Man, Hank Pym uses his genius to change size, command armies of ants, and support his allies.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage.

Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

<color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to gain an Assist from a random <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> ally.

This attack cannot be dodged.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.

Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

<color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to gain an Assist from a random <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> ally.

This attack cannot be dodged.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to gain an Assist from a random <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> ally

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

<color=#86e619>60%</color> chance to gain an Assist from a random <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> ally.

This attack cannot be dodged.

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage.

Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

<color=#86e619>60%</color> chance to gain an Assist from a random <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> ally.

This attack cannot be dodged.
4.nextUpgrade: Always gain an Assist from a random <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> ally

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage.

Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain an Assist from a random <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> ally.

This attack cannot be dodged.

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage.

Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain an Assist from a random <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> ally.

This attack cannot be dodged.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary target
Gain an Assist from a random <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage.

Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain an Assist from a random <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> ally.
Gain an Assist from a random <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally.

This attack cannot be dodged.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing.
Bonus Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

Clear all <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color> from self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies. Heal self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

This attack is Unavoidable.
1.nextUpgrade:
Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies for <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage on Bonus Attack

2.description:
Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies for <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing.
Bonus Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage.

Clear all <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color> from self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies. Heal self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

This attack is Unavoidable.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary target
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage on Bonus Attack

3.description:
Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies for <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing.
Bonus Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.

Clear all <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color> from self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies. Heal self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

This attack is Unavoidable.

4.description:
Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies for <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing.
Bonus Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage.

Clear all <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color> from self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies. Heal self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies for <color=#86e619>35%</color> of this character's Max Health.

This attack is Unavoidable.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing to primary target
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage on Bonus Attack

5.description:
Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies for <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing.
Bonus Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage.

Clear all <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color> from self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies. Heal self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies for <color=#86e619>35%</color> of this character's Max Health.

This attack is Unavoidable.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage on Bonus Attack
Apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies

6.description:
Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies for <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing.
Bonus Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage.

Clear all <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color> from self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies. Heal self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies for <color=#86e619>35%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies.

This attack is Unavoidable.
6.nextUpgrade:
Flip all negative effects to positive effects on self and all <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage on Bonus Attack

7.description:
Flip all negative effects to positive effects on self and all <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies.
Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies for <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing.
Bonus Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>320%</color> damage.

Clear all <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color> from self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies. Heal self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies for <color=#86e619>35%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies.

This attack is Unavoidable.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Extra Focus per <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally for this attack.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked or counterattacked.

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Extra Focus per <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally for this attack.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked or counterattacked.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all enemies
Heal self and all allies <color=#fff568>HERO</color> for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Heal self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Extra Focus per <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally for this attack.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked or counterattacked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to all enemies

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> and <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Heal self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Extra Focus per <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally for this attack.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked or counterattacked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to all enemies
Clear <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> on all enemies

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>310%</color> damage + clear <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> and <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Heal self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Extra Focus per <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally for this attack.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked or counterattacked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>370%</color> damage + clear <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Heal self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Extra Focus per <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally for this attack.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked or counterattacked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>80%</color> damage to all enemies
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to each enemy

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>450%</color> damage + clear <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Heal self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>:
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to all enemies.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Extra Focus per <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally for this attack.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked or counterattacked.

1.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies.

On Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to all enemies.

When this character or a <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>40%</color> Max Health, Barrier that character for <color=#86e619>40%</color> of this character's Max Health.
The first time this character or a <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>40%</color> Max Health, if this character does not have <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color>, Clear all negative effects from that character + Heal that character for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Barrier. <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Barrier.
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health.
1.nextUpgrade:
On Turn, attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing + flip <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>
On Turn, with <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies, attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing + flip <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>
On Turn, in <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing + flip <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>

2.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies.

On Turn:
 > Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing + flip <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies, repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> time.
 > In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to all enemies.

When this character or a <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>40%</color> Max Health, Barrier that character for <color=#86e619>40%</color> of this character's Max Health.
The first time this character or a <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>40%</color> Max Health, if this character does not have <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color>, Clear all negative effects from that character + Heal that character for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Barrier. <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Barrier.
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health.
2.nextUpgrade:
On Spawn, Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies for <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health
If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies, enemies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> and <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Slow</color>

3.description:
On Spawn:
 > Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies for <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies.

On Turn:
 > Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing + flip <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies, repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> time.
 > In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to all enemies.

When this character or a <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>40%</color> Max Health, Barrier that character for <color=#86e619>40%</color> of this character's Max Health.
The first time this character or a <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>40%</color> Max Health, if this character does not have <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color>, Clear all negative effects from that character + Heal that character for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies, enemies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> and <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Barrier. <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Barrier.
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health.
3.nextUpgrade:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619></color> turns
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> Healing

4.description:
On Spawn:
 > Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies for <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619></color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies.

On Turn:
 > Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing + flip <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

 > In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to all enemies.

When this character or a <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>40%</color> Max Health, Barrier that character for <color=#86e619>40%</color> of this character's Max Health.
The first time this character or a <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>40%</color> Max Health, if this character does not have <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color>, Clear all negative effects from that character + Heal that character for <color=#86e619>35%</color> of this character's Max Health.

If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies, enemies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> and <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Barrier. <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Barrier.
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health for self and all <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain for self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies

5.description:
On Spawn:
 > Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies for <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619></color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies.

On Turn:
 > Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing + flip <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies, repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> time.
 > In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to all enemies.

When this character or a <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>40%</color> Max Health, Barrier that character for <color=#86e619>40%</color> of this character's Max Health.
The first time this character or a <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>40%</color> Max Health, if this character does not have <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color>, Clear all negative effects from that character + Heal that character for <color=#86e619>35%</color> of this character's Max Health.

If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies, enemies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> and <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.
